meanings.definition: One who provides assurance or guarantees.
meanings.sent1: The assuror promised to fix the broken toy.
meanings.sent2: The assuror assured the customer that the product was of high quality.
meanings.sent3: The assuror confidently stated that the job would be done on time.
meanings.sent4: She acted as an assuror, ensuring that the event would be a success.
meanings.sent5: The assuror's guarantee gave the client peace of mind.

meanings.definition: To give assurance or make a guarantee.
meanings.sent1: He will assuror his support for the project.
meanings.sent2: She assurors her friends that she will be there for them.
meanings.sent3: The company assurors a full refund if the customer is not satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The teacher assurors the students that they will succeed with hard work.
meanings.sent5: They assuror their commitment to excellence in every task.
